name: PowerDrain
description:
The whole world is your game board!

Free to play (you don't have to donate anything).  No in-app purchases.  No ads.  Just a free, fun game to play with your friends.

Electric-themed location-based game where you can conquer your neighborhood and help your team capture and hold locations around the world!

Much like other location-based games, you find and capture locations around the world.  You can add energy generators to them or add shields to protect your team's locations.  Simple to play!

Use the powerdrain_scout app to add locations to your area if you don't see anything in the game.
